```mermaid
---
config:
  theme: redux-color
  look: neo
---

sequenceDiagram
        actor User as User
        participant WebUI as WebUI
        participant Server as Server
        participant Database as Database
        User ->> +WebUI: 1. Choose an product
        WebUI ->> +Server:2. GET / product()
        Server ->> +Database :3. Query product detail
        Database -->>- Server: 4. Return product detail
        Server -->> WebUI : 5. 200 / {meta,product detail}
        User ->> WebUI:6. Select product option and quantity
        User ->> WebUI:7. Add to cart
        WebUI ->> Server: POST / add-to-cart{}
        Server ->> +Database : Add product to cart
        Database -->>- Server: Return cart detail
        WebUI->>WebUI: Display shopping cart detail
        Server -->> WebUI : 200 / {meta,cart detail}
        User ->> WebUI:8. Order checkout
        WebUI->>WebUI:9. Redirect to check out page
        WebUI ->> Server: POST / calc-bill()
        User ->> WebUI: Fill in checkout form
        WebUI ->> Server:POST / checkout()
        Server ->> +Database : Add new order
        
      
       
        alt Save successfully
            Database -->>- Server: Return order detail
            Server -->> WebUI : 200 / {meta,order detail}
        else Cant save order
            Server -->> -WebUI:500 / {message}
        end
        
        WebUI->>-WebUI:Display order detail
